## SceneNode.(constructor)

Creates a new scene node

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(scene: Scene);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scene | [Scene](doc/markdown/./scene.scene.md) | Which scene the node belongs to |
